/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the glow of a bright sun, casting long shadows and creating a lens flare effect. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with billboards and advertisements, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below.
